Returning user

Welcome back to your AI team.

Sign in with Google or your workspace credentials to continue.

Single deployment tip

You can lock credentials with `APP_LOGIN_PASSWORD` and `APP_LOGIN_ALLOWED_EMAILS` in root `.env`.

Sign in

Continue with Google or use your email and password.

Google OAuth is not configured yet. Add `GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID` and `GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET` in `.env`.
